column1: Deandre Bembry just processes what just happened before he goes to help Yuta

[Charania] Along with Fred VanVleet, DeAndre‘ Bembry and Talen Horton-Tucker suspended one game for leaving bench, OG Anunoby ($30,000) and Montrezl Harrell ($20,000) have been fined for role in Lakers-Raptors altercation this week.

[Charania] Toronto's Fred VanVleet and DeAndre Bembry and Lakers‘ Talen-Horton Tucker have been suspended one game each.
[Wojnarowski] NBA has suspend Toronto's Fred Van Vleet and DeAndre Bembry one game for roles in on-court altercation vs. the Lakers, league says.

[Murphy] Kyle Lowry, Pascal Siakam, and OG Anunoby will all rest tomorrow against the Magic. DeAndre' Bembry, Jalen Harris, and Gary Trent Jr. are all doubtful.
[Murphy] The Raptors have waived Rodney Hood, DeAndre' Bembry and Paul Watson Jr.
[Wolstat] The Raptors have waived Rodney Hood, DeAndre' Bembry and Paul Watson. Didn't pick up options.
[Wojnarowski] Free agent G/F DeAndre' Bembry has agreed to a one-year deal with the Brooklyn Nets, sources tell ESPN.
[Sam Amico] Raptors have officially waived Rodney Hood, along with Paul Watson and DeAndre’ Bembry.
[Schiffer] Based on the available personnel, I'd expect a lot of Jevon Carter, Bruce Brown, Nic Claxton, Cam Thomas, Day’Ron Sharpe and DeAndre’ Bembry. And Kessler Edwards.
